001package com.technototes.library.util;
002
003/**
004 * Helper class for tracking a range
005 *
006 * Adds minimal value over com.qualcomm.robotcore.util.Range, which is the reason for deprecation
007 */
008@Deprecated
009public class Range {
010
011    /**
012     * The minimum value of the range
013     */
014    public double min;
015
016    /**
017     * The maximum value of the range
018     */
019    public double max;
020
021    /**
022     * Create a range with the given minimum and maximum
023     *
024     * @param mi Min value
025     * @param ma Max value
026     */
027    public Range(double mi, double ma) {
028        min = mi;
029        max = ma;
030        if (mi > ma) {
031            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Minimum is greater than maximum");
032        }
033    }
034
035    /**
036     * Check if the value is in the range
037     *
038     * @param val The value to check
039     * @return True if in (inclusive) range, false otherwise
040     */
041    public boolean inRange(double val) {
042        return val >= min && val <= max;
043    }
044
045    /**
046     * Scale the range by a given value
047     *
048     * @param scalar The amount to scale the range by
049     */
050    public void scale(double scalar) {
051        min *= scalar;
052        max *= scalar;
053        if (min > max) {
054            double tmp = min;
055            min = max;
056            max = tmp;
057        }
058    }
059
060    /**
061     * Get the 'middle' of the range
062     *
063     * @return the average of min &amp; max
064     */
065    public double middle() {
066        return (min + max) / 2;
067    }
068}
